name: Fight With Someone
description:
Fight With Someone

This is a very very early prototype for jam. I hope I can finish it.

You need a "Companion" for this game. You can play it by yourself if you are ambidextrous.

Controls

Sword;

Use arrow key and shoot the enemies with "L"

Shield

Use W A S D to move and block incoming projectiles

Quest:

Project the grail.
